title: Proposed
description: Planning for the node is at an early stage and financing for its construction is not yet finalised.

title: Planned
description: Planning for the node is at an advanced stage and financing for its construction is finalised.

title: Under construction
description: Construction of the passive physical infrastructure for the node is in progress.

title: Operational
description: The active network infrastructure for the node is live and carrying traffic.

title: Decommissioned
description: The node is no longer operational.

title: Inactive
description: Construction of the passive network infrastructure is complete, but the node is not yet operational.
